TopicTitle: 0.90 Cannot Right click buildings under certain Conditions

Articles.Content:
Description: After accepting a Satellite Launch mission I proceed to launch the craft into Orbit. If I complete this mission in Map mode, and then trash the completion message before switching back to the space center, when I get to the space center a random number of buildings will not allow a right click to bring up the upgrade window.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Accept a Satellite Launch Mission (Multiple ones have caused this issue so I don't think it is one specifically)

2. Launch and when getting close to completing the mission do the final moves in Map mode.

3. Trash the completion Message (While in Map Mode)

4. Exit from Map mode to the Space center (Do no switch to Vessel view first)

5. Right click on each building. Some will bring up the menu others will not.

System:

CPU: I7-4770K

Ram: 16 GB

Windows 7 home premium with all updates (64-Bit)

Graphics card: gigabyte Geforce GTX 760

Kerbal space program: 0.90 for Windows 32-bit

Current Work around: Exit to main menu and re-enter the game.
